name: AMERICAN JEWISH COMMITTEE
sampleDescriptions: Supported rollback of Corporate Average Fuel Economy standards
Supported the Protecting Religiously Affiliated Institutions Act, H.R.1730/S.994; supported the Elie Wiesel Genocide and Atrocities Prevention Act (HR 3030); supported the DREAM Act (HR 3440);

Supported cultural property agreements with Middle Eastern Countries; sent letters to members of Congress urging support of a letter drafted by the Bi-Partisan Taskforce for Combatting Anti-Semitism o
Supported the Protecting Religiously Affiliated Institutions Act (S.994)
Supported Dream Act 2017; supported extensions for current enrollees in TPS program; supported DACA
